meanings.definition: Containing a lot of liquid that falls in drops
meanings.sent1: The raincoat kept me dry even in the drippiest weather.
meanings.sent2: The sponge soaked up the drippiest parts of the spilled drink.
meanings.sent3: The drippiest faucet in the house decided to leak right before the party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were the drippiest windows to her soul, revealing every emotion.
meanings.sent5: The drippiest paint colors blended together to create a beautiful masterpiece.
